subject: An Interesting Bit of Software
msgSnippet: This could be big. Seriously. I discovered the open source tool AdaptIt a few days ago and, I kid you not, it let me put an entire book into QS in a matter of
messageBody:
This could be big.

Seriously.

I discovered the open source tool AdaptIt a few days ago and, I kid you not, it let me put an entire book into QS in a matter of hours. The same amount of text took me days the last time I did it. It strikes a balance between automation and manual control that a good orthography transfer needs. As far as I can tell, it works on Windows and (Ubuntu) Linux.

http://adapt-it.org/
